General.Name: Comefly Outdoor Co Ltd
General.Description: Comefly Outdoor Co., Ltd., doing business as MOBI GARDEN, engages in the research, design, and sale of outdoor products in China. It offers high-altitude camping, hiking camping, park leisure, exquisite camping and travelling, tent, and clothing products, as well as professional equipment under the Mobi Garden, Damu, and Xiaomu brands. The company also exports its products to Europe, Australia, New Zealand, Asia, and the United States. Comefly Outdoor Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Ningbo, China.
